name: The Walk (itch) (Bochinator)
description:
Made for the 2023 New Year Game Jam

Walk with Fox through his twilight forest. Tell him where to go or sit back and let him go at his own pace.

A mouse-only game: Click on the ground to tell Fox where to go and watch him interact with his environment. When he sits, feel free to give him a pet!

Following the modifier of a game that plays itself, Fox interacts with an infinitely-scrolling, randomly generated environment. Let it play in the background as you go about your day, and come back to discover something new.
